entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:41 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:41 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:41 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
